article: It was the last lesson before  _  holidays. The students  _  very happy. Their English teacher was very happy,  _  .The teacher  also  played nice games with them. He sang some nice songs, and then he went to the blackboard and wrote "SMILES"  on  it."This is one of the  _  words in English",he said to the class. The  _  class laughed, and then one girl  stood up  and said,"Why is it one of the longest words in English?"The teacher said  _  for a while. Then he smiled and said,"Because there is a mile between the  _  letter and the last."
